-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | String encoding conversion with ICU
--   
--   Provides an interface to ICU's uconv library function for string
--   encoding conversion.
@package uconv
@version 0.0.3


-- | String encoding conversion
module Codec.Text.UConv

-- | Convert a sequence of bytes from one encoding to another.
convert :: (UConvertible a, UConvertible b, Monad m) => EncodingName -> EncodingName -> a -> m b
type EncodingName = String
instance UConvertible SB
instance UConvertible LB
instance UConvertible String
